verses.1: Abraham in Keturah min nei zi dang khat la hi.
verses.2: Amah in tua nu tawh ta Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak le Shuah nei hi.
verses.3: Jokshan pen Sheba le Dedanʼ pa ahi hi. Dedanʼ tate: Asshurim, Lethusim le Leummim ahi hi.
verses.4: Midianʼ tate: Efah, Efer, Hanok, Abida le Eldaah ahi hi. Hihte khempeuh, Keturahʼ suanlekhakte ahi hi.
verses.5: Abraham in a neih khempeuh Isaac a pia hi.
verses.6: Ahih hangin Abraham in a zi dang tawh a tate tungah zong letsong pia a, ama nuntak lai mahin ama tapa Isaac kiang panin nisuahna lam gamah amaute a sawl khia hi.
verses.7: Abraham, kum za le kum sawm sagih le kum nga a phak ciangin,
verses.8: a hu tawpna sang a, a teek, kum tampi a pha, a khanghamin si a, ama mite tawh kivui khawm hi.
verses.9: Ama tapa Isaac le Ishmael in, Abraham in Hit miteʼ tung panin a lei, Mamre nisuahna lamah a om, Hit mi Zoharʼ tapa Efronʼ lo sung, Makpelah leihawm sungah amah a vui uh hi. Tua lai munah a zi Sarah kiangah Abraham kivui hi.
verses.11: Abrahamʼ sih khit ciangin Pasian in a tapa Isaac thupha pia hi. Isaac, Beer-lahairoi ah a teeng hi.
verses.12: Hihte pen, Abraham in Sarahʼ sila numei ahi Egypt mi Hagar tawh a neih, Abrahamʼ tapa Ishmaelʼ suanlekhakte ahi hi.
verses.13: Hihte pen a suahna tawh kizui-in Ishmaelʼ tateʼ min ahi hi: Ishmaelʼ ta upa pen Nebaioth hi a, tua ciangin Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
verses.15: Hadad, Tema, Jetur, Nafish le Kedemah ahi hi.
verses.16: Hihte pen a khua, a phual, a behin ulian sawm le nihte ahi Ishmaelʼ tate le amauteʼ min ahi hi.
verses.17: (Ishmael kum za le kum sawm thum le kum sagih a phak ciangin a hu tawpna sang-in si a, a behte tawh kivui khawm hi.)
verses.18: Amaute, Egypt nisuahna, Assiria lam Havilah panin Shur dongah teeng uh a, amauʼ sanggamte khempeuh panin amau tuam teen uh hi.
verses.19: Hihte pen Abrahamʼ tapa Isaacʼ suanlekhakte ahi hi. Abraham pen Isaacʼ pa hi a,
verses.20: Aram mi Labanʼ sanggamnu, Paddanaram gam a Aram mi Bethuelʼ tanu Rebekah zi-in a lak lai-in Isaac kum sawm li pha hi.
verses.21: Isaac in Topaʼ tungah a zi adingin thu ngen hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah ciing hi. Topa in ama thungetna pia a, a zi Rebekah gai hi.
verses.22: Ama sungah a naute kilaii gawp hi. Amah in, “Hih bang ahihleh bang hangin nungta se ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa kiangah thukan dingin amah pai hi.
verses.23: Topa in ama kiangah, “Na gil sungah minam nih om a, nangʼ sung pan a suak mihing nihte kikhen ding hi. Khat pen a khat sangin hat zaw dinga, a u zaw in a nau zawʼ na sem ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.24: Amah a suah hun a tun ciangin, a gil sungah tapeeng om hi.
verses.25: A masa pen a sanin hong suak a, a pumpi khempeuh mul a nei puan tawh kibang hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama min dingin Esau phuak uh hi.
verses.26: Tua khit ciangin a sanggampa hong suak khia a, ama khut in Esauʼ khetul len hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama min dingin Jakob kiphuak hi. Amauʼ suah ciangin Isaac kum sawm guk a pha hi.
verses.27: Tua naupangte a khan ciangin, Esau pen gam sung mi sabet siam khat hi a, Jakob ahihleh inn ah om hithiatin a cingkam khat ahi hi.
verses.28: Isaac in Esauʼ sa mat sa nene ahih manin Esau mah it zaw a, ahi zongin Rebekah in Jakob it zaw hi.
verses.29: Khat vei Jakob in meh huanin a om laitakin gamlak a sa betna panin phukhong vei-in Esau hong ciah hi.
verses.30: Esau in Jakob kiangah, “Gil kialin phukhong vei ka hih manin tua na meh san tawm khat hong nesak in,” a ci hi. (Tua ahih manin ama min Edom kici hi.)
verses.31: Jakob in, “Na innluah za hong pia lecin ka meh kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.32: Esau in, “A si ding ka hi ta hi; kei adingin innluah za bangin kimang ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.33: Jakob in, “Keiʼ tungah hong kiciam masa in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama tungah Esau kiciam a, Jakobʼ tungah a innluah za a zuak hi.
verses.34: Tua ciangin Jakob in an le bemeh Esau a pia hi. Esau in zong an ne-in tui a dawn khit ciangin a pai nading a zuan hi. Tua ahih manin Esau in a innluah za tua ciang bang bekin a ngaihsun ahi hi.
